data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Santa Ana, El Salvador to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 315,020 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Santa Ana, El Salvador

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Santa Ana, El Salvador today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.section_summary: On average, 52 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Santa Ana, El Salvador.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Santa Ana, El Salvador.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Santa Ana
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Turk people.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Santa Ana, El Salvador. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Santa Ana. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Santa Ana, El Salvador to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

location.name: Santa Ana
location.cities_list: Santa Ana, Chalchuapa, Metapán, El Congo, Candelaria de La Frontera
